name: Leong Hou U
content: Leong Hou U, Ryan – Faculty of Science and Technology | University of Macau Skip to content Leong Hou U, Ryan余亮豪 Associate Professor Head of the Centre for Data Science of Institute of Collaborative Innovation Personal Homepage: https://www.fst.um.edu.mo/personal/ryanlhu/ Academic Qualification Ph.D. in Computer Science, The University of Hong Kong, Hong Kong (2010) M.Sc. in E-Commerce Technology, University of Macau, Macau (2005) B.Sc. in Computer Science and Information Engineering, National Chi Nan University, Taiwan (2003) Research Research Interests Large-Scale Data Processing Spatial and Spatio-Temporal Data Graph Data Processing Graph Neural Networks Data Visualization Techniques, etc. Crowdsourcing Reinforcement Learning Information Retrieval Optimization Problems Contact Details Faculty of Science and Technology University of Macau, E11 Avenida da Universidade, Taipa, Macau, China Room: E11-4021 Telephone: (853) 8822-4493 Fax: (853) 8822-2426 Email: ryanlhu Page load link Go to Top
